EmailTemplate.name: Mike Outbound: Second Touch to A & B
EmailTemplate.subject: Keep Pace with Changing Tech Skills
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
We’re hearing that it’s a race to keep up with changing technology. 70% of CEOs say their organization doesn’t have the skills to adapt to changes driven by digital technologies. Software engineers have to redevelop their skills every 12-18 months ( see: https://dupress.deloitte.com/dup-us-en/focus/human-capital-trends/2017/learning-in-the-digital-age.html ).
Coursera for Business has courses like Duke University’s Java Programming ( see: https://www.coursera.org/specializations/java-programming ) and UCSD’s Object Oriented Java Programming ( see: https://www.coursera.org/specializations/java-object-oriented ).
Who is the right person on your team to speak with to see if Coursera for Business might be a fit?
